Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Flight management system database corruption. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Navigation System component. Analysis
of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 25/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
